Attributes.description: Strategy for the conceptual design of industrial chemical and biological processes; rules of thumb for chemical engineers, simulation to assist process synthesis, reactor-separator network synthesis, introduction to product design and molecular structure design, efficiency and sustainability in the chemical industry.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of CHBE 241, CHBE 346, CHBE 376, CHBE 344.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: Civil, Room: and
